Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one red-painted Greek character.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394474) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394474)
